SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! Protocol : SET &UC4RB_PUP_DB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_PROTOCOL#, "://") : SET &UC4RB_PUP_DB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_DB_CMD#, &UC4RB_PUP_SERVER_NAME#) : SET &UC4RB_PUP_DB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_DB_CMD#, ":&UC4RB_PUP_PORT#") ! Server name : SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_DB_CMD# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_DB_CMD# = &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CERTIFICATE

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This includes attaches the JIRA jar to current agent It can be used for both Windows and Unix environment
